articles.title: Trump says he will hit non-US movies with 100% tariffs - BBC
articles.description: The president blamed foreign-made movies for the American film industry's "very fast death".
articles.content:
Peter Hoskins
US President Donald Trump says he will hit movies made in foreign countries with 100% tariffs,as he ramps up trade disputes with nations around the world.
Trump said he was authorisin… [+5430 chars]
